name: Master's Favor
description:
Full Screen recommended!

My first Wild Jam submission.

A short story where you play as the assistant to a witch that lives in the woods. Gather materials and perform a ritual to undo your master's careless mistake. Reveal their true motives and choose how to react.

Controls:

Move Character: W A S D

View Inventory: TAB

Interact: F

Dialog Choices: LEFT CLICK

Advance Dialog: SPACE or LEFT CLICK
